newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: EU "disapproves" of Israeli building on West Bank.
newsitem.headline: EU "disapproves" of Israeli building on West Bank.

text.p: The European Union said on Wednesday it disapproved of the construction work begun by Israel in Arab East Jerusalem, describing the action as "an obstacle to peace".
"The EU disapproves of this move. It clearly prejudices the outcome of the permanent status negotiations," the EU said in a statement released by the Dutch presidency.
The statement came as Israeli bulldozers for the second day ripped into the pine-covered hill called Jabal Abu Ghneim in Arabic and Har Homa in Hebrew where Israel is planning a Jewish settlement.
"At this critical moment of the peace process it is more than ever necessary that both parties show restraint and return to political dialogue on all matters under dispute," the statement added.
